item.title: Naples, Italy: A Popular Tourist Destination Suffering from Violence and Unemployment
item.description: The southern Italian city has become fashionable for tourists, models and actors in a social media age. Yet it remains merciless for many of its youth...

item.title: Montenegro Shooting Kills 12, Including 2 Children, Officials Say
item.description: The authorities in the small Balkan country reported after a search that the gunman, whose rampage followed a bar fight, had been found dead.

item.title: Debate Over U.S. Sanctions on Russia For Ukraine War Intensifies
item.description: The president-elect has said he will use sanctions sparingly while vowing to end the war in Ukraine, renewing questions over their efficacy.

item.title: Israeli Threat to UNRWA Looms Over Gaza
item.description: The U.N. agency known as UNRWA has been the backbone of aid to Gaza. Now, Israel is moving to ban it over accusations that it shielded Hamas militants...

item.title: US Teenager Fighting for His Life After Father and 2 Others Killed in Mexico
